title: Hitzberger - Hauptbahnhof
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a natural fast food franchise offering wraps, sandwiches, salads, soups, curries and smoothies with vegan choices. If you are just changing trains and don't have much time, go into the big station hall, 2 floors down and you'll find it on the very east side.
